languages.text: "...Конечно же потому, что желала встать на путь искупления и стать достойным гражданином Империума?"
"...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"
languages.original_text: "...Конечно же потому, что желала встать на путь искупления и стать достойным гражданином Империума?"

traits.locale_text: "...Naturally, it's because you wished to start upon the path of redemption and become a decent citizen of the Imperium?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...Naturally, it's because you wished to start upon the path of redemption and become a decent citizen of the Imperium?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “……你希望能够更早遇见我，是因为你希望能更早一步踏上救赎之路，成为帝国的正直公民，肯定是这样吧？”
languages.original_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"

traits.locale_text: “……你希望能够更早遇见我，是因为你希望能更早一步踏上救赎之路，成为帝国的正直公民，肯定是这样吧？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «... Porque estaba deseando seguir el camino de la redención y convertirse en una ciudadana ejemplar del Imperium, espero».
languages.original_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"

traits.locale_text: «... Porque estaba deseando seguir el camino de la redención y convertirse en una ciudadana ejemplar del Imperium, espero».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「…贖罪の道を歩み、帝国の立派な市民になりたいと思ったからでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"

traits.locale_text: 「…贖罪の道を歩み、帝国の立派な市民になりたいと思ったからでしょう？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "... weil Ihr den Pfad der Erlösung beschreiten und eine aufrechte Bürgerin des Imperium werden wollt, richtig?"
languages.original_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"

traits.locale_text: "... weil Ihr den Pfad der Erlösung beschreiten und eine aufrechte Bürgerin des Imperium werden wollt, richtig?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « ... pour vous mettre sur la voie de la rédemption et faire de vous une citoyenne modèle de l'Imperium, c'est bien cela ? »
languages.original_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"

traits.locale_text: « ... pour vous mettre sur la voie de la rédemption et faire de vous une citoyenne modèle de l'Imperium, c'est bien cela ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eminim ki kefaret yolculuğuna çıkıp İmparatorluk'un saygın bir vatandaşı olmayı arzuladığın içindir."
languages.original_text: "...because you wished to embark upon the path of redemption and become an upstanding citizen of the Imperium, of course?"

traits.locale_text: "Kefaret yolculuğuna çıkıp İmparatorluk'un saygın bir vatandaşı olmak istediğin için, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
